lead_paragraph: Julian Douglas, 22, was charged with the murder of Leta Webb, who was shot in the head and arm at her Jamaica home.

headline.print_headline: Man Is Arrested in Fatal Shooting of Queens Woman, 70, at Her Door
headline.main: Man Is Arrested in Fatal Shooting of Queens Woman, 70, at Her Door

snippet: Julian Douglas, 22, was charged with the murder of Leta Webb, who was shot in the head and arm at her Jamaica home.
abstract: Police in New York City arrest Julian Douglas, charging him with murder of 70-year-old Queens woman Leta Webb.
